summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of marketplace cart functionality with new model images and progress indicator fixes. All major features working correctly with minor form validation issue identified.

ui_bugs.issue: Form validation error messages not displaying when invalid data is entered (invalid email format, phone not 10 digits, PIN not 6 digits)

passed_tests: Store page loads with Green Goblin hoodie and new model images
Color selection changes model images correctly (6 colors: black, blue, green, red, white, yellow)
Add to cart functionality works with cart counter updates
Cart page displays items with properly cropped model images (no white background)
Remove item from cart functionality works
Order summary calculates totals correctly (items total, shipping FREE, grand total)
Checkout page progress indicator shows step 2 active with green line at 50% width
Checkout order summary displays model images with proper cropping (object-fit: cover, object-position: center 20%)
Form submission with valid data navigates to confirmation page
Confirmation page progress indicator shows ALL steps completed with green line at 100% width and step 3 with number 3
Dark theme consistency across all pages (black background, gold accents, green progress indicators)
All data-testid attributes present for automated testing
All 6 model images load correctly from /assets/ folder
Empty cart scenario handled with proper messaging
Continue shopping functionality works from empty cart
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix form validation error display - validation logic exists but error messages are not showing to users when invalid data is entered (email format, phone digits, PIN digits)
